solution.text:
Let the present age of Anil be x years,
And,
Present age of sunil be y years.
Then, before _{j}_ year:
Anil's age = x - _{j}_years
Sunil's age = y - _{j}_years
Therefore,
x + y = _{k}_
And,
x - _{j}_ =_{i}_(y - _{j}_)
Solving these equations:
i.e. x = _{k}_ - y
_{k}_ - y - _{j}_ = _{i}_(y - _{j}_)
_{{k-j}}_ - y = _{i}_y - _{{i*j}}_
_{{k-j}}_+_{{i*j}}_ = _{{i+1}}_y
y = \(_{{k-j+(i*j)}}_\over _{{i+1}}_\)
x = _{k}_ - \(_{{k-j+(i*j)}}_\over _{{i+1}}_\)
x = \({_{{k*(i+1)}}_-_{{k-j+(i*j)}}_}\over _{{i+1}}_\)
x = \(_{{(k*(i+1))-(k-j+(i*j))}}_\over _{{i+1}}_\)
Thus, Present age of Anil = \(_{{(k*(i+1))-(k-j+(i*j))}}_\over _{{i+1}}_\)years and Sunil = \(_{{k-j+(i*j)}}_\over _{{i+1}}_\)years

content.text: Sum of the present ages of Sunil and Anil is _{k}_ years. _{j}_years ago Anil's age was _{i}_times of Sunil's age.Find their present age.
